caption.p: Electrochemical characterization of ZnO-coated AC at 100 ms and 70 Â°C: ( a) at different ALD coating cycles at the scan rate of 25 mV/s; ( b) CV loop of 6-cycle ZnO coating at different scan rates; ( c) GCD curves at different ALD coating cycles; ( d) Charge-discharge profiles of 6-cycle ZnO coating at 3.2 V using different current densities; ( e) EIS spectrum of various ZnO ALD coated AC; (f) Self-discharge behavior of various ZnO ALD coated AC.
